doc.title: Nagymama
doc.plot: Nagymama is true story about Karolina Serester, grandmother who moves to the United States, but brings along some of her old world traditions. The four-minute animated short reflects on Nagyymama's bedtime rituals. Most parents worry about their babies falling out of their cribs or catching a cold while sleeping. Nagymama shares these concerns, but with one difference; her granddaughter, Stephanie, is already nine years old! When Nagymama turns to some old-world measures, things get out of control, including Stephanie's bladder!
